reviews.review: Its dead by daylight not much else to say
Es necesario disminuir el tiempo de emparejamiento, suelo demorar hasta 15/20 minutos encontrar una partida.
This game makes me Rage in a good way :)

El juego me atrapo desde que lo jugue ya que es muy interezante jugar de ambos bandos en lo personal me gusta jugar de killer por que los personajes son tan buenos.
Great game! This is probably one of the best games I've ever  played in this genre, awesome characters; as a new first time player, I highly recommend this game!

It is a fun game if you don't play the killers.
The management is adjusting the game to stay close to the survivors and to destroy the killers.
There is no freedom for the killers. There is no such thing as free choice according to the management. It cannot even be a game.
Let me reiterate.
It is a fun game if you don't play the killers. Do not choose the wrong one.

The game itself is great 10/10. However, the people that play it are so toxic and want to win so badly that they ruin it. If you want to play a casual game you will get rolled by a premade. Meanwhile, if you play with a comp mindset you will probably get called bad for using meta perks.

This game has alot to offer for gameplay and content. although some killers are far too OP, with the right team and loadout you can still stand a chance for one to escape. overall, one of my favorite games to play today
It's like being in a group project where everybody thinks someone else is doing the work

ĞŸĞ¸ÑˆĞ°ÑÑÑ Ñ€Ñ–ÑˆĞµĞ½Ğ½ÑĞ¼ Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ·Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ½Ğ¸ĞºÑ–Ğ² Ğ”Ğ‘Ğ”ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦.Ğ¢ÑƒĞ´Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ¼Ğ¾ÑĞºĞ°Ğ»Ñ–Ğ² Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ĞºĞ»ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ…!!Ğ¡Ğ›ĞĞ’Ğ Ğ£ĞšĞ ĞĞ‡ĞĞ†ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦
Love playing this game with my friends,

As a casual game, this is well worth the money and time. Pretty friendly community on both survivor/killer sides on the lower levels. Lots of different playstyles possible between killers or survivors.

However if you go into this trying to be sweaty/pro, it will get frustrating and toxic. The gameplay will also be boring monotonous due to most top players using the same best builds.
Highly addictive game. Some players are very insulting, but if you can avoid getting angry about other players, then you should definitely test this game!

In Diesem Spiel merkt mann einfach wie viel MÃ¼he sich die Entwickler geben um es immer zu verbessern. Es ist ein Spiel wo mann Killer und Survivor sein kann und alles aus 2 Perspektiven sehen kann. Das Loopen und die Map Kenntnisse muss man sich erst aneignen aber es lohnt sich und macht viel SpaÃŸ, da mann es auch mit seinen Freunden Spielen kann.
icky game but fun at times

This game came out during a trend of niche horrors centered around four survivors evading one big baddy. None of those others last though, but Dead by Daylight not only lasts it thrives! If you want a competitive, niche fun and thrilling horror game experience pick this title up.
This game favours the killers. If you want to enjoy it play killer, but don't play survivor or you'll just get annoyed at how OP all the killers are.
yes really enjoying this game, I played it on Xbox and enjoyed it is a shame that they took the Stranger Things Chapter off i enjoyed that chapter.
